entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
